method.name: GoLanguageSettings
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.LanguageSettings End Sub
Goes into the language setting to check if it has changed the language you've chosen

method.name: AddSpeaking
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.AddSpeaking="bla bla bla" End Sub
Add the second text to speaking

method.name: GetEngineByPackageName
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.GetEngineByPackageName End Sub
Return the current Engine Package Name

method.name: RateToSpeak
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.RateToSpeak=3.5 End Sub
Set the rate for the speaking

method.name: ShutDown
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.ShutDown End Sub
Release the ICOSTextToSpeech.

method.name: StopToSpeak
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.StopToSpeak End Sub
Stop the ICOSTextToSpeech.

method.name: ChangeDefaultLanguage
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.ChangeDefaultLanguage End Sub
Programmatically change the default language of your phone with that choice yourself

method.name: Speaking
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.Speaking="bla bla bla" End Sub
Speak the first text

method.name: WriteAndSpeakText
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.WriteAndSpeakText End Sub

method.name: SetEngineByPackageName
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.SetEngineByPackageName="com.ivona.tts" End Sub
Set Engine PackageName

method.name: InitializeTTs
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech
tts.InitializeTextToSpeech("tts")

method.name: ReadAndSpeakSMS
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.ReadAndSpeakSMS End Sub

method.name: PitchToSpeak
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.PitchToSpeak=3.5 End Sub
Set the pitch for the speaking

method.name: SetLanguageToSpeak
method.comment:
Examples: Dim tts As ICOSTextToSpeech Dim b1 As Button
Sub b1_Click tts.SetLanguageToSpeak End Sub
Set the language

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

method.name: ForecastConditions
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=ForecastConditions(0) - between 0 and 3
Return Day Of Week + Condition + Low Temp. + High Temp.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather
Initialize("ics")
Initilize the object

method.name: GetLowTemp
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=GetLowTemp(0) - between 0 and 3
Return the Low Temperature

method.name: GetCondition
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=GetCondition(0) - between 0 and 3
Return Condition

method.name: GetDayOfWeek
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=GetDayOfWeek(0) - between 0 and 3
Return Day Of Week

method.name: GetIconConditions
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim img As ImageView
SetCityName="NewYork" img.SetBackgroundImage=GetIconConditions(0) - between 0 and 3
Display Icon condition

method.name: GetHighTemp
method.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=GetHighTemp(0) - between 0 and 3
Return the High Temperature

property.name: CurrentWindCondition
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=getCurrentWindCondition
Return Current Wind Condition

property.name: CityName
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CityInformation
Return Forecast City Name

property.name: CurrentHumidity
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CurrentHumidity
Return Current Humidity

property.name: CurrentForecastConditions
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CurrentForecastConditions
Return CurrentCondition + Temp F + Temp C + Humidity + Wind Condition

property.name: ForecastDate
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=ForecastDate
Return Forecast Date

property.name: PostalCode
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=PostalCode
Return Forecast Postal Code

property.name: CurrentTempC
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CurrentTempC
Return Current Celsius

property.name: CurrentIconConditions
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim img As ImageView
SetCityName="NewYork" img.SetBackgroundImage=CurrentIconConditions
Display Current Icon For Condition

property.name: SetCityName
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim img As ImageView
SetCityName="NewYork"
Set City Name to be loaded

property.name: CurrentTempF
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=getCurrentTempF
Return Current Fahrenheit

property.name: CurrentForecastInformation
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CurrentForecastInformation
Return ForecastInformation (city , postal code , forecast date , current date time , unit system)

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

property.name: CurrentCondition
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CurrentCondition
Return CurrentCondition

property.name: UnitSystem
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=UnitSystem
Return Forecast Current Unit System

property.name: CurrentDateTime
property.comment:
Dim ics As ICOSGoogleWeather Dim lb As Label
SetCityName="NewYork" lb.Text=CurrentDateTime
Return Forecast Current Date Time

method.name: StopAnimTitleBar
method.comment: Stop the animation

method.name: InfinitySlideReverseTitleBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.InfinitySlideReverseTitleBar("anim",600,2) anim.StartAnimTitleBar End Sub

method.name: AutoRepeat
method.comment: Set repeat infinity automatically

method.name: StartAnimTitleBar
method.comment: anim.StartAnimTitleBar

method.name: FadeInTitleBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim ImageView1 As ImageView Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.FadeInTitleBar("anim",2) anim.StartAnimTitleBar End Sub

method.name: SlideTitleBarFromRightToLeft
method.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.SlideTitleBarFromRightToLeft("anim",600,2) anim.StartAnimTitleBar End Sub

Sub b1_Click anim.SaleTitleBarFromCentreToLeftRight("anim",2) anim.StartAnimTitleBar End Sub

method.name: Flip3DTitleBar
method.comment:
Direction -> FLIP_HORIZONTAL = 1 Direction -> FLIP_VERTICAL = 2 Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim ImageView1 As ImageView Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.Flip3DTitleBar("anim",ImageView1,180,3,anim.FLIP_HORIZONTAL) anim.StartAnim(ImageView1) End Sub

method.name: InfinityFadeTitleBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim ImageView1 As ImageView Dim Button1 As Button

method.name: SlideTitleBarFromLeftToRight
method.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.SlideTitleBarFromLeftToRight("anim",600,2) anim.StartAnimTitleBar End Sub

method.name: AutoReverse
method.comment: Set reverse automatically

property.name: StartAnimAtTime
property.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim ImageView1 As ImageView Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.StartAnimAtTime=5000 The Animation Will start after 5 seconds anim.FadeOut(2) anim.StartAnim(ImageView1) End Sub

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

method.name: ExtractVAT
method.comment: Dim s As ICOSString Dim label1 As Label Example: Label1.text=s.ExtractVAT(100,15) Result is 86.9565

method.name: StrLeft
method.comment: Dim s As ICOSString Dim label1 As Label Example: Label1.text=s.StrLeft$("Hello Basic4Android" , 5) "Hello"

method.name: Mid
method.comment: Dim s As ICOSString Dim label1 As Label Example: Label1.text=s.Mid$("Hello Basic4Android" , 7 , 13) "BasicAndroid"

method.name: StrRight
method.comment: Dim s As ICOSString Dim label1 As Label Example: Label1.text=s.StrRight$("Hello Basic4Android" , 7) "Android"

method.name: CalculatesVAT
method.comment: Dim s As ICOSString Dim label1 As Label Example: Label1.text=s.CalculatesVAT(100,15) Result is 115

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

property.name: Version

class.name: giuseppe.salvi.icos.library.ICOSSeekBar
class.event: ValueChanged(Value As Int , FromUser As Boolean)
VolumeChanged(Volume As Int , FromUser As Boolean)

method.name: InitializeVolumeBar
method.comment:
You have to use this with MediaPlayer or ICOSMusicPlayer
Example: Dim ics As ICOSSeekBar
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) ics.InitializeVolumeBar("ics") ics.ProgressBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") ics.CursorBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") Activity.AddView(ics,115,500,350,35) End Sub

method.name: BringToFront
method.comment: Send this view to front

method.name: InitializeProgressBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim ics As ICOSSeekBar
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) ics.InitializeProgressBar("ics") Activity.AddView(ics,115,500,350,35) End Sub

method.name: RemoveView
method.comment: Remove this View

method.name: InitializeSeekBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim ics As ICOSSeekBar
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) ics.InitializeSeekBar("ics") ics.ProgressBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") ics.CursorBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") Activity.AddView(ics,115,500,350,35) End Sub

method.name: SendToBack
method.comment: Send this view to back

property.name: ProgressBarMax
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeProgressBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
Set the Max value of ProgressBarMax

property.name: Value
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
return progress Value

property.name: CursorBitmap
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
Example:
ics.CursorBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png")

property.name: ProgressBitmap
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
Example:
ics.ProgressBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png")

property.name: StreamVolume
property.comment: return the value of Volume ( the value is between 0 to 15)

property.name: Max
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
return Max Value

property.name: ProgressBarValue
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeProgressBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar)
Set the value of ProgressBarValue

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

property.name: Version

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Object. Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.Initialize("ph")

method.name: LedOnOff
method.comment:
Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.LedOnOff Flash Mode On
This W'll turn Flash Mode ON or OFF if is supported.

method.name: GetDisplayMetricsHeight

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return The Version Of this Library

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Object. You Should Initialize Before Load Any Sounds. Example: Dim mp as ICOSMusicPlayer mp.Initialize("mp")

method.name: PlayMusicFromFile
method.comment: Load any media file and Play. Example: Dim Label1 as Label Label1.Text = mp.PlayMusicFromFile("sdcard/media/somefile.mp3",mp.Get_Title) or mp.PlayMusicFromFile("sdcard/media/somefile.mp3",0,True) type is any information about any media file, type 0 = null.

method.name: IsPlaying
method.comment: Return true if ICOSMusicPlayer is currently playig

method.name: Play
method.comment: Play or resume the media you loaded before

method.name: PlayMusicFromAsset
method.comment: Load any media file and Play. Example: Dim Label1 as Label Label1.Text = mp.PlayMusicFromFile("sdcard/media/somefile.mp3",mp.Get_Title) or mp.PlayMusicFromFile("somefile.mp3",0,True) type is any information about any media file, type 0 = null.

method.name: ConvertTimeToSeconds
method.comment:
Give you the real length in MM:SS Example: Sub Process_Globals Dim timer1 As Timer Dim mp As ICOSMusicPlayer End Sub
Sub Globals Dim label1 As Label End Sub
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) timer1.Initialize("timer1",1000) timer1.Enabled=True mp.Initialize mp.PlayMusicFromFile("sdcard/media/1.mp3",0,True) End Sub
Sub Activity_Resume If mp.IsPlaying Then mp.Play timer1.Enabled = True timer1_tick End If End Sub
Sub timer1_Tick If mp.IsPlaying Then Label1.text="Position: " & mp.ConvertTimeToMinuts & " - " & ConvertTimeToSeconds ( "Position: 3:28 - 0:00" ) End If End Sub

method.name: Stop
method.comment: Stop Playing. You must load the media before to Play it again

method.name: Release
method.comment: Release all resources Allocated by ICOSMusicPlayer

method.name: Pause
method.comment: Pause the current playback. You can resume it from the current position at any time by calling mp.Play

method.name: setSetVolume
method.comment: Set the volume for each channell. The value should be between 0 to 100. Example: mp.SetVolume(100,100)

method.name: ConvertTimeToMinuts
method.comment:
Give you the real length in MM:SS Example: Sub Process_Globals Dim timer1 As Timer Dim mp As ICOSMusicPlayer End Sub
Sub Globals Dim label1 As Label End Sub
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) timer1.Initialize("timer1",1000) timer1.Enabled=True mp.Initialize mp.PlayMusicFromFile("sdcard/media/1.mp3",0,True) End Sub
Sub Activity_Resume If mp.IsPlaying Then mp.Play timer1.Enabled = True timer1_tick End If End Sub
Sub timer1_Tick If mp.IsPlaying Then Label1.text="Position: " & mp.ConvertTimeToMinuts & " - " & ConvertTimeToSeconds ( "Position: 3:28 - 0:00" ) End If End Sub

method.name: PlayRingtone
method.comment: TYPE_RINGTONE TYPE_NOTIFICATION TYPE_ALARM TYPE_ALL Example: mp.PlayRingtone(mp.Type_Ringtone)

property.name: Duration
property.comment: Return the total value of the loaded media in milliSeconds

property.name: Position
property.comment: Get Or Set The Current Position In MilliSeconds

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

class.name: giuseppe.salvi.icos.library.ICOSGridView
class.event: ItemClick (Position As Int, Value As Object)
ItemLongClick (Position As Int, Value As Object)

method.name: InitializeBitmap
method.comment: Initialize the Object. Example: Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing ip.Initialize("ip")

method.name: MyToastView
method.comment:
mGravity 1 = Gravity.TOP mGravity 2 = Gravity.CENTER mGravity 3 = Gravity.BOTTOM
Duration 0 = Toast.LENGTH_SHORT Duration 1 = Toast.LENGTH_LONG
Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Dim img As ImageView - ( You can use any view " (ImageView is just an examples) ") Example:
Sub b1_Click ip.MyToastView(img, mGravity, Duration) End Sub

method.name: Emboss
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Emboss(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png") Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap)

method.name: Smooth
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Smooth(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png" , SmoothValue) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap ,SmoothValue)

method.name: Mirror
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Mirror(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png")) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap)

method.name: RoundCorner
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.RoundCorner(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png" , RoundValue) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap , RoundValue)

method.name: FlipBitmap
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Type = 1 --> FLIP_VERTICAL Type = 2 --> FLIP_HORIZONTAL Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Flip(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png" , Type) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap , type)

method.name: SetWalpaper
method.comment: Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: Sub b1_Click ip.setWalpaper(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png")) End Sub

method.name: MyToastBitmap
method.comment:
mGravity 1 = Gravity.TOP mGravity 2 = Gravity.CENTER mGravity 3 = Gravity.BOTTOM
mDuration 0 = Toast.LENGTH_SHORT mDuration 1 = Toast.LENGTH_LONG
Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Dim img As ImageView Example: Sub b1_Click ip.MyToastBitmap(LoadBitmap(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png") , mGravity, mDuration) End Sub

method.name: Boost
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: Type = 1 --> RED Type = 2 --> GREEN Type = 3 --> BLUE ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png" , Type , Percentage) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap , Type , Percentage)

method.name: ImageRotate
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Rotate(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png" , RotateDegree) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap ,RotateDegree)

method.name: GaussianBlur
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.GaussianBlur(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png",BlurValue) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap, BlurValue)

method.name: SepiaEffect
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.SepiaEffect(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png" ,Depth , Red , Green , Blue) Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap ,Depth , Red , Green , Blue)

method.name: Engrave
method.comment: Dim ImageView1 as ImageView Dim ip as ICOSImageProcessing Example: ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Engrave(LoadBitmap(File.Dirassets , "SomeFile.png") Or ImageView1.Bitmap=ip.Boost(ImageView1.Bitmap)

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library

class.name: giuseppe.salvi.icos.library.ICOSGallery
class.event: ItemClick (Position As Int, Value As Object)
ItemLongClick (Position As Int, Value As Object)

method.name: AddTextAndBitmap
method.comment: Add Text and Bitmap Example: gallery.AddTextAndBitmap("Hello",LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"icon.png))

method.name: dispatchSetSelected
method.comment: Dispatch setSelected to all of this View's children.

method.name: AddBitmap
method.comment: Add only Bitmap Example: gallery.AddBitmap(LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"icon.png))

method.name: AddTwoText
method.comment: Add Two Text Example: gallery.AddTwoText("Hello","Basic4Android)

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Clear all item from the Gallery

method.name: GetItem
method.comment: Return the value of the item at specified position in a Gallery

method.name: RemoveAt
method.comment: Remove the item at specified position in a Gallery

method.name: AddTwoTextAndBitmap
method.comment: Add Two Text and Bitmap Example: gallery.AddTwoTextAndBitmap("Hello","Basic4Android",LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"icon.png))

method.name: AddText
method.comment: Add single Text Example: gallery.AddText("Hello")

property.name: Gravity
property.comment: Describes how the child views are aligned.

property.name: Spacing
property.comment: Sets the spacing between items in a Gallery Examples: gallery.Spacing=24

method.name: Flip3DView2
method.comment:
Example: Dim anim As ICOSAnimation Dim ImageView1 As ImageView Dim Button1 As Button
Sub b1_Click anim.Flip3D_XYZ("anim",ImageView1,0,180,3,anim.FLIP_HRIZONTAL) anim.StartAnim(ImageView1) End Sub

method.name: AutoRepeat
method.comment: Set repeat infinity automatically

method.name: Swap2View
method.comment:
Direction -> FLIP_HORIZONTAL = 1 Direction -> FLIP_VERTICAL = 2 Example: Dim anim As ICOSFlip3DView Dim img1,img2 As ImageView Dim Button1 As Button
Sub img1_Click anim.Swap2View("anim",img1,img2) End Sub

method.name: Flip3DView
method.comment:

Sub b1_Click anim.Flip3DView("anim",ImageView1,180,3,anim.FLIP_HRIZONTAL) anim.StartAnim(ImageView1) End Sub
